data.trans_hint: Tiết học toán đã quá giờ ra chơi.

data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi phải đến sân bay lúc hai giờ, và thời gian cứ trôi qua.
data.en_hint: We had to get to the airport by two, and the minutes were ticking away.
data.content_game_1: We had to get to the airport by two, and the minutes were ticking away.
data.answer_en_hint: We had to get to the airport by two, and the minutes were ticking away.

data.trans: Trong phút cuối, vào lúc cuối
data.trans_hint: Cô ấy luôn luôn làm bài tập của cô ta trong phút cuối, nhưng vẫn qua bài kiểm tra với điểm rất cao.
data.en_hint: She always does her assignment at the last moment, but passes with flying colors.
data.content_game_1: She always does her assignment at the last moment, but passes with flying colors.
data.answer_en_hint: She always does her assignment at the last moment, but passes with flying colors.

data.trans_hint: Trước khi tôi rời đi, tôi đã viết vội một mẩu giấy cho mẹ và ghim nó vào tủ lạnh.
data.en_hint: Before I left, I dashed off a note for my mom and pinned it on the fridge.
data.content_game_1: Before I left, I dashed off a note for my mom and pinned it on the fridge.
data.answer_en_hint: Before I left, I dashed off a note for my mom and pinned it on the fridge.

data.trans: Không vội/ Có đủ thời gian để làm gì
data.trans_hint: Jane đang hành động như thể chúng tôi không hề vội, nhưng chúng ta thực sự đang bị trễ.
data.en_hint: Jane is acting as if we were in no hurry to go, but we actually are late.
data.content_game_1: Jane is acting as if we were in no hurry to go, but we actually are late.
data.answer_en_hint: Jane is acting as if we were in no hurry to go, but we actually are late.

data.trans_hint: Chẳng bao lâu nữa bạn sẽ nhận ra rằng bạn phạm một sai lầm khủng khiếp đến như vậy
data.en_hint: You will realize that you have made such a terrible mistake one of these days.
data.content_game_1: You will realize that you have made such a terrible mistake one of these days.
data.answer_en_hint: You will realize that you have made such a terrible mistake one of these days.

data.trans: Nhìn lại những kỷ niệm trong quá khứ
data.trans_hint: Điều yêu thích của tôi để làm vào cuối năm là tụ tập với nhóm bạn của tôi là và nhìn lại những gì đã xảy ra trong năm.
data.en_hint: My favorite thing to do at the end of the year is to get together with my group of friends and reflect on what happened over the year.
data.content_game_1: My favorite thing to do at the end of the year is to get together with my group of friends and reflect on what happened over the year.
data.answer_en_hint: My favorite thing to do at the end of the year is to get together with my group of friends and reflect on what happened over the year.

data.trans: Vội vàng (không kiểm tra kỹ càng)
data.trans_hint: Thay vì vội vàng mua ngôi nhà đó, tại sao chúng ta không đi xem những ngôi nhà khác trước khi bạn đưa ra quyết định?
data.en_hint: Instead of rushing into buying this house, why don't we see some other houses before you make the decisions?
data.content_game_1: Instead of rushing into buying this house, why don't we see some other houses before you make the decisions?
data.answer_en_hint: Instead of rushing into buying this house, why don't we see some other houses before you make the decisions?

data.trans_hint: Con gái thường hay lề mề chuẩn bị mỗi khi đi chơi.
data.en_hint: Girls often take forever to get ready every time they go out.
data.content_game_1: Girls often take forever to get ready every time they go out.
data.answer_en_hint: Girls often take forever to get ready every time they go out.

data.trans: Cứ từ từ mà làm, không vội vàng
data.trans_hint: Chúng ta không vội đâu, nên em cứ từ từ mà chuẩn bị.
data.en_hint: We are in no hurry to go, so take your time to get ready.
data.content_game_1: We are in no hurry to go, so take your time to get ready.
data.answer_en_hint: We are in no hurry to go, so take your time to get ready.

data.trans_hint: Khi bạn nhìn lại, bạn sẽ vô cùng ngạc nhiên rằng thời gian trôi nhanh như chó chạy ngoài đồng.
data.en_hint: When you look back, you will be surprised at how much time flies.
data.content_game_1: When you look back, you will be surprised at how much time flies.
data.answer_en_hint: When you look back, you will be surprised at how much time flies.

data.trans_hint: Nếu bạn còn độc thân khi ở độ tuổi cuối 20, bạn sẽ phải chịu rất nhiều áp lực từ gia đình của mình.
data.en_hint: If you are single when you are in your late 20s, you will be under so much pressure from you family.
